=== Pär Andersson ===

Contact information is available on my <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~paran|Launchpad account - paran]]</nowiki>

==== About me ====

I have been using Linux and various other unix systems since 1998,
Debian since 2000 and Ubuntu since 2004.

I live in Linköping,
<nowiki>[[http://www.uncyclopedia.org/wiki/Sweden|Sweden]]</nowiki> and work as a
Systems Developer at <nowiki>[[http://www.nsc.liu.se|NSC (National Supercomputer Centre)]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.liu.se|Linköpings universitet]]</nowiki>.

==== Contributions ====

Not as much as I would like.

* Report and help fix bugs, in both Ubuntu and Debian
* backports
* Swedish support on #ubuntu-se
